entities.name: tuney
entities.description: Tuney is Petunia's nickname, mentioned in the conversation between the sisters.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is Lily's sister, who does not want to attend Hogwarts and learn magic.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is Petunia's sister, who wants to attend Hogwarts and persuade Professor Dumbledore to change his mind.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is a character mentioned in the conversation between Lily and Petunia, who has the power to change their fate.

relationships.description: Lily and Petunia are sisters, as mentioned in the conversation between them.
Lily wants to persuade Professor Dumbledore to change his mind, as she hopes to attend Hogwarts.
